Enabled to Write.--Early in my public labors I was bidden by the Lord, "Write, write the things that are revealed to you." At the time this message came to me, I 
                                                                           38
could not hold my hand steady. My physical condition made it impossible for me to write. But again came the word, "Write the things that are revealed to you." I obeyed; and as the result it was not long before I could write page after page with comparative ease. Who told me what to write? Who steadied my right hand, and made it possible for me to use a pen? It was the Lord.
